entities.name: the beetle
entities.description: The Beetle at Bay is mentioned in the title of the story.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: Cho is a student who interacts with Harry. She said 'Hi' to him and asked if he missed Quidditch ("You really miss it, do n’t you?").

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story who interacts with Cho. He said 'Hi' to her and talked about missing Quidditch ("Yeah," sighed Harry. "I do.").

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is a person who signs out people from the school. Cho and Harry joined the queue of people being signed out by him.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who skims over the stands in the Quidditch stadium with Ginny.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as someone who skims over the stands in the Quidditch stadium with Ron.

relationships.description: Cho and Harry interacted with each other, saying 'Hi' to each other and talking about missing Quidditch.
Harry felt envious of Ron who was playing Quidditch with Ginny.
Harry felt envious of Ginny who was playing Quidditch with Ron.
Cho showed concern for Harry when she asked if he missed Quidditch ("You really miss it, do n’t you?").
